Posts.Content: I am 12 years out and I can say you will stop. I thought in the beginning that I would never stop thinking of breast cancer every day--but then I did. As time passes, you will become more comfortable and not have it permeate every thought you have. That's not to say that when I go for a mammogram that I don't have anxiety. I do and that is natural. It will get better.
Posts.Title: eight months out
